item.title: Entrepreneurship in the Pre-Owned Clothing Market: The Role of Pictures in Second-Hand Marketplaces
item.description: This article explores pricing dynamics and consumer behavior in second-hand marketplaces, emphasizing the significant role of privacy in user interactions and decision-making. Focusing on platforms like Tise, where users act as micro-entrepreneurs, I delve into how privacy concerns influence buying and selling practices.
